parameters.name: MaxResult
parameters.description:
Number of data entries to display per page during pagination.

Default value: 50. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: Token for the next query start.

parameters.name: SettingName
parameters.description: Setting name of the associated resource tag rule.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
Whether the associated resource tag rule is enabled. Values:

- Enable: Enabled.
- Disable: Disabled.
